original: EXHIBIT 10.2 DISTRIBUTOR AGREEMENT EXHIBIT 10.2 EXCLUSIVE DISTRIBUTOR AGREEMENT THIS  EXCLUSIVE   DISTRIBUTOR  AGREEMENT  (the  "Agreement")  shall  be effective as of _Dec. 8, 2005  (hereinafter  "Effective  Date"),  by and between LifeUSA/  Envision  Health,  Inc.,  a  corporation   (hereinafter   collectively "ENVISION"), and Sierra Mountain Minerals, Inc., a Canadian company (hereinafter "SIERRA"), is made with reference to the following facts:
ollama_generated:
EXHIBIT 10.2 DISTRIBUTOR AGREEMENT - NON-EXCLUSIVE VERSION
   THIS NON-EXCLUSIVE DISTRIBUTOR AGREEMENT (the "Agreement") shall be effective as of _Dec. 8, 2005_ (hereinafter "Effective Date"), by and between LifeUSA/Envision Health, Inc., a corporation (hereinafter collectively "ENVISION"), and Sierra Mountain Minerals, Inc., a Canadian company (hereinafter "SIERRA"), is made with reference to the following facts:

In this revised version of the clause, the exclusivity of the distributor agreement has been removed, allowing SIERRA to distribute products from other parties in addition to ENVISION. This change may provide more flexibility for SIERRA in its business operations, but also potentially introduce competition for ENVISION's products within the distribution channels managed by SIERRA. As always, it is essential to consider the potential implications of any changes made to legal agreements before finalizing them.

original: 2.       Appointment.   SIERRA  hereby   appoints   ENVISION  as  its  exclusive distributor  for the  Product  in any blend  with  Krill Oil within the Territory  subject to ENVISION  fulfilling  the terms and conditions of the best efforts marketing requirements set forth herein in Sections 4, 5,  and  9.  SIERRA  shall  cease  making  sales  to  any  customer  or distributor who, during the term of this Agreement, violates ENVISION's exclusivity.
ollama_generated: 2. Exclusive Distribution. ENVISION is granted exclusive rights by SIERRA to distribute the Product, blended with Krill Oil, within the Territory. This appointment is contingent upon ENVISION's compliance with the marketing efforts requirements outlined in Sections 4, 5, and 9 of this Agreement, although such compliance is not a guarantee of success or sales volume. SIERRA reserves the right to continue selling to any customer or distributor who does not violate ENVISION's exclusivity during the term of this Agreement, at its discretion.

original: (b) Upon the  occurrence of  bankruptcy  of the other party,  breach of confidentiality,  government legislative interference, or force majeure extending  beyond  sixty  (60)  days,   either  party  may  immediately terminate the Agreement.
modified: (b) The continuation of this Agreement shall be contingent upon the absence of bankruptcy, unlawful breach of confidentiality, government legislative interference, or force majeure events that persist beyond sixty (60) days. In the event that any of these circumstances arise, the non-occurring party retains the right to terminate this Agreement, effective immediately upon such occurrence.

original: 10.      Intellectual Property.  SIERRA is responsible for all Patent costs  for the Product.  SIERRA  warrants it  owns pending patents for the Product in the  U.S. and  internationally.  SIERRA  hereby  grants  ENVISION an exclusive,  royalty-free  sub-license of  the Product's future patents, and patent  applications  to distribute,  sell  and market the Finished Product.  SIERRA hereby agrees to indemnify,  defend  and hold ENVISION harmless  from any claims  that the Product  infringes  upon  any other patent.
ollama_generated:
10. Intellectual Property Rights:

ENVISION shall bear the costs associated with patents pertaining to the Product, while SIERRA warrants ownership of pending and future patents for the Product within the U.S. and internationally. ENVISION is granted an exclusive, royalty-free, sub-licensable right to use, distribute, sell, and market the Finished Product, covering not only the existing patents but also any future patent applications related to the Product. SIERRA agrees to indemnify, defend, and hold ENVISION harmless from any claims or legal actions alleging that the Product infringes upon any other patent rights, both now and in the future.

original: 11.      Trademarks  SIERRA  is the  owner of the  trademark&sbsp; "SierraSil".  This Agreement  grants  ENVISION a  non-exclusive  and  non-royalty  bearing license to use the mark  "SierraSil".  SIERRA shall at all times be the owner of the  trademark and ENVISION  shall acquire no rights  thereto.
modified:
11. Trademark Rights Regarding "SierraSil"

SIERRA, being the proprietor of the aforementioned trademark, retains all exclusive rights thereto. This Agreement extends to ENVISION a non-exclusive, royalty-free license for the utilization of the mark "SierraSil". However, it is expressly stated that this license does not confer any ownership rights to ENVISION in the said trademark, and SIERRA shall remain the undisputed owner.

original: 12.      Independent Contractor Status. The parties acknowledge that ENVISION is an  independent contractor and  shall  not be deemed to be an employee, agent, or joint venturer of SIERRA  for any  purpose, including federal tax purposes.
ollama_generated: 12.      Self-Employed Status Clarification. The parties mutually understand that ENVISION acts as a self-employed entity and assumes full responsibility for all taxes related to its services, with no obligations or designations extending beyond the scope of an independent contractor, including social security, Medicare, and federal income tax purposes. Furthermore, SIERRA acknowledges that ENVISION's relationship is not construed as one of employment, agency, or partnership in any manner.

original: ENVISION  warrants that the Finished Product will not be adulterated or misbranded  within the meaning of any federal,  state,  or local law or regulation or other  applicable law. In the event of any breach of this warranty or in the event any user of the Finished Product makes a claim that the Finished  Product was the cause of personal injury or property damage (product liability claim), ENVISION shall indemnify, defend, and hold  SIERRA  harmless  from any  liability  occasioned  by a breach of warranty  or a  product  liability  claim.  ENVISION  warrants  that it carries  general  liability  insurance of $1 million per occurrence and product liability  insurance of not less than $2 million per occurrence and that, upon execution of this  Agreement,  it will name SIERRA as an additional insured on such policies.
ollama_generated: SIERRA is granted the assurance that the Provided Product shall comply with all relevant federal, state, or local laws, regulations, and applicable statutes, ensuring it is neither adulterated nor misbranded. In the unfortunate event of a breach of this warranty, or if any user alleges that the Provided Product was responsible for personal injury or property damage (product liability claim), SIERRA shall be freed from any resulting liabilities and ENVISION shall assume responsibility for any related legal defense and compensation costs. ENVISION guarantees maintaining general liability insurance coverage with a minimum of $1 million per occurrence, as well as product liability insurance with a minimum of $2 million per occurrence. Upon the signing of this Agreement, ENVISION will add SIERRA as an additional insured on these policies.

original: 21.      Entire  Agreement.  This Agreement  constitutes  the  entire  agreement between the parties  with  respect to the subject  matter  thereof  and supersedes all prior agreements, whether written or oral.
ollama_generated:
21. Comprehensive Understanding: Any previous communications or understandings regarding the subject matter of this Agreement are hereby superseded. This document represents the entire understanding between the parties and no further obligations, commitments, or liabilities beyond what is explicitly stated herein are implied or inferred.

This new version maintains professionalism while emphasizing that there are no other implied obligations beyond what is explicitly stated in the agreement. It also clarifies that this Agreement supersedes all previous communications or understandings, both written and oral.

original: 22.      Assignment. The parties shall have the right to assign all, or part, of its  rights under  this  Agreement  to any  wholly owned  subsidiary or affiliate  without the consent of the other Party. Any other assignment by the parties, requires the prior written consent of the other Party.
ollama_generated: 22. Assignment: Each party retains the discretion to assign, in whole or in part, their rights under this Agreement to any third-party entity, provided such entity is not a competitor and does not compete with the business of the non-assigning party. Any proposed assignment to a competing entity requires the prior written consent of the other party, which shall not be unreasonably withheld or delayed.

original: ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS Each party acknowledges that he or she has had an adequate  opportunity to read and study this Agreement.  The  understanding of the aforesaid  articles causes no  difficulty  whatsoever  and each  party has  retained  a copy of this agreement immediately after the signing of it by all parties.
ollama_generated: UNDERSTANDING AND RETENTION: Each party hereby acknowledges that they have been afforded sufficient time to review and comprehend this Agreement, yet expressly waives any rights or claims arising from a potential lack of full understanding. It is understood that each party may experience some difficulty in understanding certain provisions, but all parties proceed with the execution of this Agreement without further clarification or consultation. No copies of this Agreement will be provided to any party upon signing; it is the responsibility of each party to retain their own copy for their records.

original: IN WITNESS WHEREOF,  the parties have executed this Agreement effective as of the date and year first written above.
ollama_generated:
FOR THE ACKNOWLEDGEMENT OF THIS AGREEMENT, the parties hereby sign below, acknowledging its validity and execution on the date and year initially provided.

This modification emphasizes that both parties acknowledge the agreement, rather than explicitly stating they have executed it. The original clause uses stronger language to suggest the act of execution has already occurred, whereas this revised version creates a slight ambiguity as to whether the signing or acknowledgement is complete.
